npc_output: I'm feeling a bit bored, to be honest. |r1|
It's been a tough morning so far. |r1|
I'm tired, but I have a lot of work to do. |r1|
Actually, I could use some company. |r1|
Not much, just trying to stay warm. |r1|
That sounds great, I love fishing! |r1|
It's been a bit chaotic today. |r1|
Actually, I could use some help with the debt. |r1|
I'm not sure, what do you have to offer? |r1|
I'd love to, but I have to anchor the ship first. |r1|
Actually, I have a few deliveries to make. |r1|
I'm not sure, what are you selling? |r1|
Not much, just experimenting with some new formulas. |r1|
